column41: The -£997,650 relates to an accrual for FY 18/19 SMS bonuses.  The FCO will award the bonuses this year to the SMS for their work in FY 18/19.  The estimated costs have therefore been transferred back to last FY in the end-of-year accounting exercise to recognise the expenditure in the period in which it was incurred
